name: Hamlet, or the Last Game without MMORPG Features, Shaders and Product Placement
name_original: Hamlet, or the Last Game without MMORPG Features, Shaders and Product Placement
description:
Hamlet, or the Last Game without MMORPG Features, Shaders and Product Placement is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Денис Галанин. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Alawar Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Hamlet, or the Last Game without MMORPG Features, Shaders and Product Placement on PC.
